Button.Name: CommandSetMinPrice
Button.Tooltip: Click to set minimum price for search.

Button.Name: CommandSetMaxPrice
Button.Tooltip: Click to set maximum price for search.

Button.Name: FindButton
Button.Tooltip: Search the market and show any items that match this search.

Button.Name: CommandPreviousPage
Button.Tooltip: Go to the previous page of search results.

Button.Name: CommandNextPage
Button.Tooltip: Go to the next page of search results.

Button.Name: CommandLastPage
Button.Tooltip: Go to the last page of search results.

Page.Name: ScrollPage

Button.Name: ButtonWho
Button.Tooltip:
Execute a /who all command on the seller name to check whether they are online.
Does not work for sellers selling from their houses, i.e. where it says "Visit..."
(if this button is disabled you first need to move your mouse over the currently highlighted seller name)

Button.Name: ButtonTell
Button.Tooltip:
Sends a tell to the seller about the offered item (the text can be predefined in _ProfitUI_MiscSettings.txt).
Does not work for sellers selling from their houses, i.e. where it says "Visit..."
(if this button is disabled you first need to move your mouse over both the currently highlighted item name and seller name)

Page.Text: :5f6b97aea47e1464:Longestnameposs's Luxery Apartment at Fish's Luxury Apartment in Queynos Harbor

Page.Name: Selected Page
Page.Text: :5f6b97aeaf09212c:[DEVL]N to seller and M to broker

Page.Name: InfoPage
Page.Text: :5f6b97ae59b5d197:Using the broker, you can sell items to other players even while offline. Start by dragging normal or special vending container or special broker container to one of the empty Lots. Next, drop items into the lots and set your desired selling price.

Page.Tooltip: This is the amount of coin you have waiting to be picked up.

Button.Name: TakeCoinButton

Button.TooltipDisabled: There is no coin left in this lot to pick up.

Page.Text: [DEVl]4 lines worth of text Second line

Button.Name: CommandRemoveItem
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97ae96984f6f:Remove the item from the consignment lot.

Button.Name: CommandRemoveStack
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97aec809f972:Remove the stack from the broker.

Button.Name: CommandRemoveOne
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97ae7299a6b5:Remove one of the selected items.

Button.Name: CommandRemoveQuantity
Button.Tooltip: :5f6b97aea1ad2ae5:Open up the quantity window to specify how many to remove.

Page.Text: <date time> wwwwwwwwwwww buys a large freshwater trout for 1p

Button.Name: right_arrow
Button.Tooltip: Expand (not saved, set frame to "none" in windowsettings to save)

Button.Name: left_arrow
Button.Tooltip: Shrink (not saved, set "frame only" in windowsettings to save)
